siteDescription: Brooklyn-based design engineer specializing in frontend development, React/Next.js, and interactive web experiences. 20+ years building digital products and user interfaces.
bio: michael ciccarelli designs, codes, and ships digital products and interactive experiences. brooklyn-based, working worldwide through thirdindex.

bullets: Advised clients on digital product strategy, UX/UI design, and frontend development.
Conducted workshops and training sessions on modern web technologies.
Designed and developed responsive web interfaces and UI components for fintech platform.
Built brand-focused design systems, motion libraries, and integrated headless CMS.
Built metal.build (smart contract deployments) and pod.xyz (DAO governance platform).
Developed multiple Farcaster frames and EVM-compatible dApps.
Developed React apps, data visualizations, and reusable UI libraries for fintech products.
Led frontend for VICE's publishing platform across VICELAND, Noisey, i-D, and VICE News.
Architected migration from legacy LAMP stack to modern React architecture.
Built responsive websites and interactive features for GQ, Wire
